description: Non Material amendment to planning permission 22/02950/FUL (Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition1(Approved Plans) and Condition 3 (Materials) of Planning Permission 22/00834/HOU (Erection of part single, two-storey side extension and first floor side extension with associated changes to fenestration. Formation of new hipped roof with ridge height raised 300mm and rear dormer roof extension with installation of 3no front and 2no side rooflights to facilitate loft conversion) to allow alteration to fenestration, wall position and materials.) to allow alteration to rooflights.
decision_conditions: The proposed repositioned rooflight to the north-western roofslope is considered to cause harm to neighbouring amenity of No. 18 The Ridge, by way of increased overlooking/loss of privacy, contrary to Policy DM10 of the Council's adopted Core Strategy, 2012.
